content.en: Edge computing optimization: Researchers are exploring how deep reinforcement learning algorithms can optimize various aspects of mobile edge computing. These algorithms, such as Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) and Deep Meta Reinforcement Learning (DMRO), are being used to improve task offloading strategies, resource planning, computation offloading, and resource management in edge computing networks. Additionally, federated deep reinforcement learning is being investigated for online task offloading and resource allocation in challenging mobile edge computing environments.
content.da: Edge computing-optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan dyb reinforcement-learning-algoritmer kan optimere forskellige aspekter af mobil edge computing. Disse algoritmer, såsom Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) og Deep Meta Reinforcement Learning (DMRO), anvendes til at forbedre opgaveoverførselsstrategier, ressourceplanlægning, beregningsoverførsel og ressourcehåndtering i edge computing-netværk. Derudover undersøges fødereret dyb reinforcement learning til online opgaveoverførsel og ressourceallokering i udfordrende mobile edge computing-miljøer.
